name: Over-grown Greenhouse
longDesc: This area was clearly once used for cultivating plants- exotic and magical ones, if you had to guess. The lack of active cultivation doesn't seem to have done them much real harm- the room has a thick coating og dark green moss over every surface, a few bright floral blooms peak out between the leaves, and the air is thick with petrichor.
shortDesc: An area covered in moss and a few bright flowers.

shelves.name: Glass Terrarium
shelves.desc: On one of the tables, you make out what appears to be a glass terrarium. The terrarium's edges are plated in copper and the top comes to a diamond-like point.  Inside the terrarium, you see an exotic looking plant.

shelves.name: Wooden Planter
shelves.desc: Next to one of the windows is a rotting, wooden planter where a range of bizarre-looking plants are growing.

doors.name: Pruned Plants
doors.desc: The remains of the ivy and vines dance in the self-made doorway.
